verses.verse: Sing<WH7891> to Yahweh<WH3068> a new<WH2319> song,<WH7892> for he has done<WH6213> marvelous things!<WH6381> His right hand,<WH3225> and his holy<WH6944> arm,<WH2220> have worked salvation for him.<WH3467>
Yahweh<WH3068> has made known<WH3045> his salvation.<WH3444> He has openly shown<WH1540> his righteousness<WH6666> in the sight<WH5869> of the nations.<WH1471>

He has remembered<WH2142> his loving kindness<WH2617> and his faithfulness<WH530> toward the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478> All the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776> have seen<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of our God.<WH430>
Make a joyful noise<WH7321> to Yahweh,<WH3068> all the earth!<WH776> Burst out and sing<WH6476> for joy,<WH7442> yes,<WH2167> sing praises!
Sing<WH2167> praises to Yahweh<WH3068> with the harp,<WH3658> with the harp<WH3658> and the voice<WH6963> of melody.<WH2172>
With trumpets<WH2689> and sound<WH6963> of the ram<WH7782>'s horn, make a joyful noise<WH7321> before<WH6440> the King,<WH4428> Yahweh.<WH3068>
Let the sea<WH3220> roar<WH7481> with its fullness;<WH4393> the world,<WH8398> and those who dwell therein.<WH3427>
Let the rivers<WH5104> clap<WH4222> their hands.<WH3709> Let the mountains<WH2022> sing for joy<WH7442> together.<WH3162>

Let them sing before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> for he comes<WH935> to judge<WH8199> the earth.<WH776> He will judge<WH8199> the world<WH8398> with righteousness,<WH6664> and the peoples<WH5971> with equity.<WH4339>
